title: Secretary as a user
description: The secretary is identified as a user with the capability to manage the biscuit stock for the cafe.
rationale: The secretary's role includes managing the biscuit stock for the cafe.

existingRequirement.title: Secretary User Role
existingRequirement.description:
The system should recognize the secretary as a distinct user role.

---

The user role of the secretary should be defined in the system.
existingRequirement.rationale:
Different user roles may have different system access and capabilities.

---

The secretary needs to perform specific tasks within the system, such as retrieving completed payments.
